original_text: In the past, he said to them, ‘This is a place where you can rest when you are tired. It is a place where you can be safe.’ But his people refused to listen. In the past, he said to them, ‘This is a place where you can rest when you are tired. It is a place where you can be safe.’ But his people refused to listen.
korean_text: 전에 그들에게 이르시기를 이것이 너희 안식이요 이것이 너희 상쾌함이니 너희는 곤비한 자에게 안식을 주라 하셨으나 그들이 듣지 아니하였으므로

sentences.original_text: In the past, he said to them
'This is a place where you can rest
It is a place where you can be safe'
sentences.korean_translation: 이곳은 너희가 안전할 수 있는 곳이다'

sentences.original_text: But his people refused to listen
